content: but will that give government control over the news? "The Maryland Democrat proposed a bill Tuesday that would rewrite tax law to allow newspapers to operate as tax-exempt nonprofit organizations, just as long as they don't make official endorsements of political candidates. But some media analysts say that could create government control of the news." "http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2009/03/26/critics-say-senate-invite-government-control-news/"
reply: but will that give government control over the news? "The Maryland Democrat proposed a bill Tuesday that would rewrite tax law to allow newspapers to operate as tax-exempt nonprofit organizations, just as long as they don't make official endorsements of political candidates. But some media analysts say that could create government control of the news." "http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2009/03/26/critics-say-senate-invite-government-control-news/"
title: New tax law to make newspapers non-profit orgs
